short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take screenshot easy and fast, auto copy screenshot and save to history locally.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fast, easy and informative screenshot tool.

â˜‘ï¸ Screenshot any area on screen (default: Alt + C)
â˜‘ï¸ Show color of cursor position and screenshot size, copy with RGB / Hex format (default: Secondary click AKA Right click)
â˜‘ï¸ History record of all screenshots, can be filtered by website and date.
